wikitext.*:
'''TIR''' is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "watch, observe",<ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 187 (root appearing as âˆšTIR)</ref>  "to look at (towards), watch, watch over",<ref name=RGEO>{{RGEO|Notes}}, p. 73 (root appearing as TIR)</ref> or "watch, guard".<ref name=LR>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 394 (root appearing as TIR-)</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''tirin'' ("watch"); ''[[tirion (Quenya)|tirion]]''<ref name=LR/>
*[[Noldorin]]: ''tiri'' ("watch"); ''[[tirith]]''<ref name=LR/>

==Other versions of the legendarium==

The ''Qenya Lexicon'' includes the stem TIRI, with the [[Qenya]] derivative ''tiri-'' ("watch; keep, guard, preserve, look at, gaze at, observe").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
